name: Ext_R4B_MedicationRequest_reasonReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationRequest.reasonReference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.reasonReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Condition or observation that supports why the prescription is being written
element.definition: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.reasonReference` maps to R5 `MedicationRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
